trans-unit.source: Light object that projects its effect along a direction specified by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 投射其效果沿著方向，所指定的光源物件<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLight objects have no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLight 物件都有空間中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect in a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 建立燈光投射其效果，以指定方向的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This contructor creates an instance of a white light projected along a Vector3D of value `(0,0,-1)`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建立執行個體值的 Vector3D 沿著預計有白色淺色`(0,0,-1)`。

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights 有方向，但沒有空間中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a light that projects its effect along a specified Vector3D with a specified color.
trans-unit.target: 建立投射其效果與指定的色彩指定的 Vector3D 沿著光線的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: DirectionalLights have a direction, but no position in space.
trans-unit.target: DirectionalLights 有方向，但沒有空間中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Diffuse color of the new light.
trans-unit.target: 新的光擴散色彩。

trans-unit.source: Direction of the new light.
trans-unit.target: 新的燈光的方向。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight"></xref>物件，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Represents the vector along which the light's effect will be seen on models in a 3-D scene.
trans-unit.target: 表示沿著其燈光的效果會顯示在 3d 場景中的模型的向量。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the light projects, and which must have a non-zero magnitude.
trans-unit.target: Vector3D 沿著此光線的專案，並必須有非零大小。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `(0,0,-1)`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.DirectionalLight.Direction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
